post.title: First Server Down Experience
post.content:
My server went down on yesterday and after some troubleshooting and opening a support ticket, I had to get some sleep. Would love to have brought it back online earlier today, but had some competing priorities, but it’s development so no harm no foul. Tomorrow I will review the logs to see if there is something interesting lurking. Hopefully I’ll find something to share.

Anyways, it’s good to be back up and running.

Nos vemos!
